body:
Blaze- 5 throwable firecharges, a stone sword and full leather armor

Scientist- a splash instant health potion, a splash poison potion, a splash instant damage potion ,wood sword and gold chestplate and rest is leather

Rabbit- Jump 2, two carrots that give it speed, stone sword, full leather armor

Squid- bow with 30 arrows that have a chance of blindness, wood sword and full leather armor

Tank (donor)- Full iron armor, stone sword, slowness 1

Wither- Stone sword that has the chance to give the wither effect (10% wither 2) and full leather armor

Gravity- stone sword kb 2, with full leather armor

Hound(Donor)- Speed 1, stone sword, chain chestplate and rest leather, and 2 bones that gives it a beneficial effect (besides speed)

title: Kit Suggestions for Nexus (8 creative ideas)

replies.body:
I love these Ideas but I think that there is enough kits already 
and blaze should be full leather armor DYED orange
replies.body_tagged:
I love these Ideas but I think that there is enough kits already 
and blaze should be full leather armor DYED orange

replies.body: I think there are enough kits, but maybe there could be 'Achievement' kits like 100 kill/10 kill streak/5 matches won in a row. Then it could be more interesting.
replies.body_tagged: I think there are enough kits, but maybe there could be 'Achievement' kits like 100 kill/10 kill streak/5 matches won in a row. Then it could be more interesting.

replies.body: Tank should be used at around level 48? It's really OP :P
replies.body_tagged: Tank should be used at around level 48? It's really OP :P

replies.body:
Who bumped this?

anyways:

BlaZe(clan) is good

I feel like poison potions are too op, change scientist to a slowness pot

There is scout so rabbit is useless

Squid is a bit overpowered with 30 arrows. Just give it 3 blindness orbs and a wood sword

Tank should have slowness 2

Wither is nice but it seems up. Maybe no helmet and boots and an iron sword?
Gravity should have and iron sword with kb 1 as knock back 2 should be reserved or the spanky spade. 

Hound is cool. The bones should give resistance 1 for 10 seconds.

replies.body: Lightning - Stone Sword, leather armour. When the user kills an enemy, the user gains Speed X and Jump boost II for 4 seconds.
replies.body_tagged: Lightning - Stone Sword, leather armour. When the user kills an enemy, the user gains Speed X and Jump boost II for 4 seconds.

replies.body: Thor- Stone sword, leather armour. Every 15 seconds they can right click / block with the sword to summon lightning. Classic kit
replies.body_tagged: Thor- Stone sword, leather armour. Every 15 seconds they can right click / block with the sword to summon lightning. Classic kit
